message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great asset to you as well. Given its importance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $12,000. I understand its value to you is $8,000, but I hope this offer will make it an attractive proposition. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making a purchase.
